description: This source file defines a class 'RuleBasedBugAnalyzer' which implements an interface 'IBugAnalyzer'. It performs rule-based static analysis on code snippets to identify potential bugs or issues by scanning for patterns such as TODO comments, debug statements, hardcoded secrets, and language-specific code smells. The class provides an AnalyzeAsync method that returns detected issues with severity levels and messages based on simple regex checks and heuristics.

classes.name: RuleBasedBugAnalyzer
classes.description: A rule-based static code analyzer for bug detection, implementing key heuristics to identify common issues in code snippets.

methods.name: AnalyzeAsync
methods.description: Performs asynchronous analysis of a code snippet to detect potential bugs or code smells, returning a set of issues along with severity and messages.
